text: How can I get my beloved HTML module now that modules are no longer accessible in the Asset Marketplace? I know as a dev, I can pull it down from another portal, then upload via the CLI, but this request is for a non-dev client. In the past I pointed them to the module in the asset marketplace and recommended they download it.
maybe use the "copy to portal" functionality?
Gotcha, yeah. Thatâ€™s easier than the CLI :smile: I may do that for the client. Thanks, Andreas.
hopefully its not for long ( rumors has it that the marketplace for modules will be relaunched next year iirc)
